metadata.Title: CVE-2020-17354 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: LilyPond before 2.24 allows attackers to bypass the -dsafe protection mechanism via output-def-lookup or output-def-scope, as demonstrated by dangerous Scheme code in a .ly file that causes arbitrary code execution during conversion to a different file format. NOTE: in 2.24 and later versions, safe mode is removed, and the product no longer tries to block code execution when external files are used.

criterions.comment: lilypond: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
